contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Mastering serialization at Xperience by Kentico
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Lukasz Skowroński, from Kentico partner Konabos, shows off his solutions architecture skills by covering the complex topic of Xperience by Kentico's serialization based CI/CD features, how they work, and how they help teams collaborate and deliver updates to Xperience solutions.
